name: Loli-pop!
description:
Have you ever dreamed of having a romantic encounter with a Loli? Well my friend this is your chance!
Dive right into this passionate story of forbidden love with Mochi, one of your students and feel yourself fall for this bubbly girl.
Will you let the inquisitive eyes of society destroy both of your dreams, or will you fight for love?

Loli-pop! Is a short VN created by the Various Artists for the Valentines VN jam

(Specific creator credits are shown in game)

Feel free to join our discord for updates on future projects:
https://discord.gg/qGxyt7Khfa
